title: cafter
author: cafter
content: I want to know real P2E games platform or website which is legit ,requirements:1. free play to earn game2. able withdraw tokens without depositing anything3. from which i can earn a reasonable amount or upto $10 per monthi know it's hard to find these type of games, i thought if anyone knows in this forum them suggest me .

comments.author: Yogee
comments.body: You will probably not find an established P2E game that you can play for free and still earn. You'll be required to spend at some point so you can upgrade your weapons or skills and be able to actually compete with other players. Your best bet is looking for new games but the catch is that you'll never really know if it's legit until you try it.

comments.author: UserU
comments.body: If you're into TCG (trading card games), there's Gods Unchained which is F2P.But realistically without some sort of principal, it takes a lot of effort to make things worthwhile.

comments.author: Oceat
comments.body: NFT games are your doing it already but of course you're not the only one doing it for free so you still have to compete with the others. And just like what they said it would be hard to earn what you wanted if you don't pay in order to get past with the other. So at some point in time you will have a problem getting what you want without spending some real cash in the game.It's hard to find a legit one nowadays since most of them are being hyped at first but the more you dig deep into the game the more it's getting harder to get what you want. Developers didn't just create a game where all of their user are earning money that easily plus not to mention the investors who will play with the market.

comments.author: Mikhalina Palaha
comments.body: I think finding a legitimate P2E (play-to-earn) games platform that meets all of your requirements can be a bit of a challenge, but it's not impossible. After doing some research, I believe I may have found a website that could be a good fit for you: Womplay.

comments.author: Laurent Balodis
comments.body: Important to note that most P2E games require some level of investment in order to earn significant amounts of money. However, there are some platforms that offer free play to earn options. I think, to withdraw tokens without depositing anything, many platforms do require a minimum deposit before allowing withdrawals. You need to more explore or need read whitepaper project for guide (DYOR). So, there are some platforms that offer no-deposit withdrawals. Maybe, other platform offers various games that reward players with WOM tokens, which can be withdrawn without any deposit requirements.
